articles.title: Trump tariffs: Can Vietnam golf its way out of new US import taxes? - BBC.com
articles.description: The South East Asian country has the third largest trade surplus with the US, after China and Mexico.
articles.content:
Annabelle Liang
Vietnam's PM has said he would "golf all day long" with Trump
Countries around the world are braced for Donald Trump's so-called "Liberation Day in America!!!" next week.
The US pr… [+5758 chars]
